Ragnaroks (Dragon/SP-L) 103
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Passwords List: Dragon: Ragnaroks (Dragon/SP-L) 103
The instructions for unlocking this breed are available in the Shrine Topics Section of the MRA2 Archive.
By Thorr on Wednesday, December 4, 2002 - 07:36 am:

Combine a Monol and a Diva to get this monster!

-Thorr

By Thorr on Friday, December 13, 2002 - 10:01 pm:

DRG_RGN

p 155
i 150
a 115
s 85
d 130
l 120

UpFire
TufScale

You must beat Ragnaroks with an Angel when he attacks, to unlock him fully. This is not a random event. It is a plot event.

-Thorr
